coincheck, weird API format
cryptopia, need tests

bitstamp


# prorities
bitfinex
kkex
cryptopia
huobi


### symbol
all symbols are formatted as 'coin-coin', i.e., 'ltc-btc'
`format_symbol` will take care of customizing it.


# Todo
rm try/except
better handling resp
more generalized resp
validate resp
